metadata.name: Character Shenanigans
metadata.description:
This mod requires REPENTOGON. Press the tilde key to open the new debug console and menu. There's a new Shenanigans option that will let you lock/unlock characters and their completion marks.
You can also import/export your completion marks. To import/export your unlocks/achievements and Eden Tokens, check out "Stat and Achievement Shenanigans". Technically, that mod can also handle completion marks for built-in characters. It's just in a different format.
The import JSON uses this format for modded characters: "M-{modId}-{playerName}" or "M-{modId}-{playerName}-Tainted-". If you remove "M-", this is the same format you'll find in Repentogon's completionmarksX.json files which are located here: C:\Users\username\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Repentance\Repentogon
JSON values: [list] [*]0 = Off [*]1 = Normal [*]2 = Hard [/list]
This is a companion mod to: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3131711250]Stat and Achievement Shenanigans[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2932859748]Win Streak Shenanigans[/url] [/list]
Modded characters are now supported. Hidden modded characters are accessible from the import/export tab.
Update: In an effort to tie achievements to completion marks, there's a new option to record your completion marks for any ending boss while in a run. Simply start a new run by selecting a character + difficulty, and use the options on the new Bosses tab. This will give you completion marks + any associated achievements (w/o having to go over to Stat and Achievement Shenanigans). Your mileage may vary with modded characters.
